data: `minecraft:buoyant` allows an entity to float on the specified liquid blocks.

data.Name: apply_gravity
data.Description: Applies gravity each tick. Causes more of a wave simulation, but will cause more gravity to be applied outside liquids.

data.Name: base_buoyancy
data.Description: Base buoyancy used to calculate how much will a mob float.

data.Name: big_wave_probability
data.Description: Probability for a big wave hitting the entity. Only used if `simulate_waves` is true.

data.Name: big_wave_speed
data.Description: Multiplier for the speed to make a big wave. Triggered depending on `big_wave_probability`.

data.Name: drag_down_on_buoyancy_removed
data.Description: How much an actor will be dragged down when the Buoyancy Component is removed.

data.Name: liquid_blocks
data.Description: List of blocks this entity can float on. **Must be a liquid block.**

data.Name: simulate_waves
data.Description: Should the movement simulate waves going through.
